Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelObserver, IClientConnection, Runnable
public class ClientHandler
extends Object
implements IClientConnection, Runnable
Manages the server socket connection to a single client.

  • Constructor Summary

    ClientHandler​(Socket socket, Server server, boolean firstConnected)
    Creates a new ClientHandler instance with the given parameters.

    Returns the player's name associated to the socket.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler​(Socket socket, Server server, boolean firstConnected)
      Creates a new ClientHandler instance with the given parameters. The method registers the instance in the Server.
      Parameters:
      socket - Reference to the socket
      server - Reference to the server which instantiates the class
      firstConnected - True if creating the ClientHandler associated to the first player connected.

  • Method Details

    • isExternalViewer

      public boolean isExternalViewer()
      Synchronously checks if a player is an external viewer of the game (player who has already lost).
      Specified by:
      isExternalViewer in interface IClientConnection
      Returns:
      true if player is an external viewer

    • asyncSend

      public void asyncSend​(Request request)
      Sends an asynchronous Request message through an Output Stream.
      Specified by:
      asyncSend in interface IClientConnection
      Parameters:
      request - Serializable message being sent.

    • run

      public void run()
      Run method (called in a new thread) that creates and manages ObjectInputStream and ObjectOutputStream associated to the socket. It reads messages from the client and adds them to a Server BlockingQueue
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the socket connection.
      Specified by:
